cause.description:
KIVA lets you lend (microfinance) to a specific entrepreneur in the developing world - empowering them to lift themselves out of poverty.
Kiva.org allows individuals to make $25 loans to low-income entrepreneurs in the developing world (microfinance). By doing so, individuals like you provide affordable working capital for the poor (money to buy a sewing machine, livestock, etc.), empowering them to earn their way out of poverty.
It's a new, direct and sustainable way to fight global poverty, and the way I see it, I get a higher return on $25 helping someone build a future than the interest my checking account pays.
Anyways, if you have a minute, please check out the site: http://kiva.org.
Microfinancing: http://www.quantumshift.tv/v/1175664314/
1. instilling change in the developing world from the bottom up
2. training and supporting the spirit of entrepreneurs in the developing world
3. individual empowerment and long term economic sustainability
cause.mission: provide financial services and training for poor entrepreneurs in the developing world
